mapper.select: SELECT * FROM report ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (id, target_type, reason, status, created_at, reporter_id, target_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{targetType}, #{reason}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{reporterId}, #{targetId})
mapper.update: UPDATE report SET target_type = #{targetType}, reason = #{reason}, status = #{status}, created_at = #{createdAt}, reporter_id = #{reporterId}, target_id = #{targetId} WHERE id = #{id}
